message.name: CompleteAgentMovement

field.name: AgentID
field.doc: Agent id of the sender. Notice that "client", "agent" and "avatar" all represent the same thing.

field.name: SessionID
field.doc: Temporary id assigned to this session by the simulator on login, used to verify our identity in packets.

field.name: CircuitCode
field.doc: The circuit code provided by the login response, authenticating the client.

message.doc: Move an agent into the simulator. This is the last packet needed to complete the transition into a new simulator.
